alert.note: Alert for Boone; Campbell; Kenton (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 26 at 10:35PM EST until March 02 at 4:57PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory is extended for the following rivers... Ohio River at Cincinnati. ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers... Ohio River at Maysville. Ohio River at Meldahl Dam. Ohio River at Portsmouth. ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Ohio River at Cincinnati. * WHEN...Until Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 51.0 feet, Water begins to cover more areas of Kellogg Avenue from east of Delta Avenue upstream to near Coney Island to near Eight Mile Road. Parts of Humbert Avenue in the East End of Cincinnati also begin to flood. Most of Public Landing becomes flooded, as well as Riverside Park off River Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 PM EST Saturday the stage was 49.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise. - Action stage is 40.0 feet. - Flood stage is 52.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather Radio. For additional details on river forecasts, visit water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=iln
